articles.author: Chantal Da Silva
articles.title: South Korean Prime Minister Warns Against 'Illegal Hoarding of Medical Goods' As Coronavirus Infections Surpass 600
articles.description: Over the weekend, South Korea was forced to push its alert level to its highest point after at least six deaths were reported.
articles.content: South Korea's Prime Minister warned the country's citizens against the "illegal hoarding" of medical goods amid the growing spread of the new coronavirus. Over the weekend, South Korea was forced to push its alert level to its highest point, as the number of … [+2170 chars]
